titles.title: Supporting efforts to address the crisis faced by Haitian orphans following the earthquake of January 12, 2010.
Supporting efforts to address the crisis faced by Haitian orphans following the earthquake of January 12, 2010.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Urges the federal government to continue to work to improve the lives of Haitian orphans and to expeditiously develop a safe, legal process to reunite Haitian orphans with family members in the United States.
